Welcome to Practice Mode!

 In this mode, you have the freedom to navigate through the questions at your own pace. Use the Next and Previous buttons to move seamlessly between questions.

 Feeling stuck? No worries! If you encounter a challenging question, simply tap on the Hint button. A helpful hint awaits to jog your memory and guide you towards the right answer.

 Remember, mastery comes with practice. Take your time, enjoy the learning process, and empower yourself for interview success. Happy practicing!

Welcome to Live Mode!

 Step into the spotlight and embrace the excitement of real-time challenges. In this mode, you'll experience the intensity of a timed interview simulation.

 A question will appear, and the countdown timer will begin. You must think quickly and provide your answer before time runs out. The clock is ticking, and your skills are on display.

 With every second that passes, you'll gain a taste of the time pressure that comes with interviews. Adapt, stay focused, and respond confidently. This dynamic practice is designed to enhance your problem-solving abilities and boost your confidence.
